text: José Guadalupe Galván Galindo (21 August 1941 – 16 July 2022) was a Mexican Roman Catholic prelate. He became a priest in 1965. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Ciudad Valles, Mexico from 1994 to 2000 and as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Torreón, Mexico from 2000 until his retirement in 2017. He was born in Cadereyta Jiménez, Mexico. Galván Galindo died on 16 July 2022 at a hospital in Torreón, Mexico from congestive heart failure, aged 80.Murió José Guadalupe Galván Galindo, obispo emérito de Torreón ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:Mexican Roman Catholic bishops
title: José Guadalupe Galván Galindo
